title: Client Freezing in champ select
body:
The client is now either glitching out so I can't see my runes and mastery at random or locking up on a pick or ban animation.
Then I have to wait as if I dodged the game? wtf is this crap.

replies.body: Oh, is that the new client? I'm not using that.

This could be caused by either issues with your PC running the client due to system performance, or it could be caused by a poor connection to our servers. The first step I recommend is jumping into your client's settings menu (cog in the top-right corner) to enabled *low-spec mode* and disable *animation*. I've provided a screenshot to visually assist you:

http://image.prntscr.com/image/598e949fe2904c85b3220875cf13760f.png

Let me know if this caused any change in your symptoms.
